questions.question: What is the predominant color of the device's main body?
What shape best describes the device's overall form factor?
What material appears to constitute the water tank component?
What color is the visible light emanating from the device?

What is the color of the detachable water tank?

What is the apparent length of the attached power cord?

Describe the appearance of the connection between the tank and the device.
What is the apparent purpose of the gold-colored light element?
What is the general design style of the device (e.g., modern, rustic)?
Does the device seem to have any visible buttons or controls?
What is the apparent capacity of the water tank (relative size)?
